channel.description: Recent content in concepts on Trustgrid Docs

item.title: Docs: Cluster
item.description:
Clusters are pairs of Nodes that share config.

Clusters are active/passive. Not everything makes sense at a cluster level. bladiblah.

item.title: Docs: Node
item.description:
A Trustgrid node is the core building block in a network that allows remote access and edge computing.

You can cluster them. Also they have SNMP. and stuff.
